players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie's death is a huge blow to our team. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafioso, we need to lynch her."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
